item.description: This is an outdoor Berklee Bean Town Jazz Festival. Located on Columbus Ave and Mass. Ave, 6 blocks long with 3 stages, many regional musicians. Clint & Friends will be at the Festival Saturday all day. Please call Clint's cell phone at 781-593-1417 to meet up throughout the day at the event. Bring your friends, let's party and enjoy the Berklee Bean Town Jazz Festival. Hope to see you there, Clint
item.how_to_find_us: Clint will be at the Festival on the 24th all day. Call Clint's cell phone 781 593 1417 to Meet Up at the event. Hope to see you all there, Clint
item.name: 9-24-11 Millionaires Meet up at Berklee Jazz Fest call Clint @ 781-593-1417
